title: jpyfer
author: jpyfer
content: Official Shibacoin ANN:Join the Shibacoin project: Listing on exbitron soon...Shibacoin- you must be mining to get this coinCoin Specification :Algorithm Scrypt Proof of Work (POW) and Proof of Stake (POS)Coin Name SHIBACOINCoin Ticker SHIBACoinbase maturity (default 24 confirmation) blocksTransaction (default 6 confirmation) blocksTotal Coins 15.000.000 SHIBAMin. stake age 12 hoursMax. stake age UnlimitedTarget spacing 2 minutesTarget timespan 10 minutesDiscord https://discord.gg/aYhX7c6d4dWebsite https://www.coinshiba.xyz/Block Explorer https://explorer.coinshiba.xyz/Github https://github.com/shibacoinproject/shibacoinMining pools https://miningpoolstats.stream/shibacoinTelegram https://t.me/CoinshibaXyzTwitter https://twitter.com/conquestxbbThanks,Shibacoin Project Team

comments.author: Bacardi Toni
comments.body: Why a new post for the coin?

comments.author: jpyfer
comments.body: It's just an official thread ... from the actual coin dev.happy mining..

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Is this a fork or same as the original Shiba?

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: Quote from: Hodoor on September 11, 2022, 10:04:34 AMIs this a fork or same as the original Shiba? it's just the same name and not a fork because the original shiba came from a token of the ETH network so there won't be a fork or anything like that, shiba is just a smart contract and this shiba is owning its own blockchain unlike the original shiba that rides on the blockchain network in ETH
